title: Smart WebView
description:
A simple use webview integrated with native features to help build advanced hybrid applications.

Smart WebView introduces a powerful plugin architecture, empowering developers to seamlessly extend and customize their hybrid applications. This update enhances core functionalities and streamlines the development process, making it easier to integrate advanced features like Live GPS Tracking, Camera integration, FCM, Rating system, Multi-UI, QR scanner, AdMob, Google Analytics, and more.
